Package model

Class Character

java.lang.Object
model.Textures
model.Character
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
PlayerMP
public class Character extends Textures
Character class represents a character from texture.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Cheremnykh Olesia and Dmitrii Zamedianskii
See Also:
Textures, Serialized Form
